All of a sudden, Needlenose could feel a light tap on his shoulder.

_________________________________________

Hook turned around from his work, and started to speak, but didn't sound
to interested. "What do you mean? Megatron has been dead for a long
time, but if that new renegade Havotron wants us, we might as well take
it. Besides, there has got to be a reason the Predacons have been
telling us to build this ship." he says, motioning to their creative
work. He turned around to face Scrapper, and transformed into his crane
mode. The hook part swiveled on it's base, then picked up an engine
piece. He then lifted it, and swiveled back to place, letting the engine
go into the front of the ship. "It's all yours Mixmaster." he said,
talking down.
